Articles.Content: I was wondering a few things. Does a mod/addon to the game have to use scripting? Also, I kinda need feedback on my first mod. Things about the model and other stuff would help. Also, how exactly do I start CODING for Kerbal Space Program on top of adding parts? Anyway, if you guys wanna add feedback, here you go: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/power-decoupler/
